p: Among the first studies that have shown the pharmacological activities of various components of the plant, the stand out compounds that have reported the anti-inflammatory capacity and the modulating effects of heat shock protein (Hsp) on apigenin and quercetin flavonoids, as well as the anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and antiseptic activities detected in Î±-bisabolol, guaiazulene, and chamazulene [ 76, 77].
